    • Method Detail

      • sumOf

        public static int sumOf(Permission... permissions)
        Converts permissions passed in to an integer values and sums them up.
        Parameters:
        permissions - permission enum values e.g. ("CREATE", "READ") to be converted to integer value
        Returns:
        the sum of permissions
        See Also:
        sumOf(Set)

      • sumOf

        public static int sumOf(java.util.Set<Permission> permissions)
        Converts permissions passed in to an integer values and sums them up.
        Parameters:
        permissions - a set of permission enum values e.g. ("CREATE", "READ") to be converted to integer value
        Returns:
        the sum of permissions
        See Also:
        sumOf(Permission...)

      • fromSumOf

        public static java.util.Set<Permission> fromSumOf(int sumOfPermissions)
        Builds a set of permissions based on integer value that represents sum of permissions.
        Parameters:
        sumOfPermissions - sum of permission integer values defined in Permission enum
        Returns:
        a list of permissions.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedPermissionsException - when sumOfPermissions is smaller than MIN_PERMISSIONS_VALUE or larger than MAX_PERMISSIONS_VALUE
